canonical_text:
Short DAO Proposal Text

Title: Enable Phase 1 Governance for Xea Oracle
​

Summary:
This proposal activates on‑chain governance for the Xea Governance Oracle, defining who can propose, how voting works, and how passed proposals are executed via a timelock.
​

Key Points:

Token‑weighted voting with a minimum quorum and simple majority to pass.
​

Proposals configure oracle parameters, treasury usage, and contract upgrades.
​

Passed proposals are queued in a timelock before execution to improve security.

claims.text:
Title: Enable Phase 1 Governance for Xea Oracle
​

Summary:
This proposal activates on‑chain governance for the Xea Governance Oracle, defining who can propose, how voting works, and how passed proposals are executed via a timelock.
Token‑weighted voting with a minimum quorum and simple majority to pass.
Proposals configure oracle parameters, treasury usage, and contract upgrades.
Passed proposals are queued in a timelock before execution to improve security.
